trans-unit.source: Provides a class to be used by <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.PassportAuthenticationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe a ser usada pelo <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.PassportAuthenticationModule" />.

trans-unit.source: It provides a way for an application to access the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.PassportIdentity.Ticket(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece uma maneira de um aplicativo acessar o método <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.PassportIdentity.Ticket(System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the Login server should compare the <c>iTimeWindow</c> parameter against the time since the user last signed in or against the last time the Ticket was refreshed.

trans-unit.source: The typical default name space is "passport.com".
